events.comment: When clicking the 'Share' button, prompt the share user interface. Windows 8 will then call 'On Share', asking for what content should be shared. Then we respond with 'Share text' and pass 'Hello world' to share. You can also share links and HTML.

action.name: Share text
action.param: "#battle_of_bunker"&newline&"I have played the 'Battle of Bunker' and I have collected "&points&" points and achieved level "&level&"! "&newline&"Will you be better than me? "&newline&"http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/en-us/app/battle-of-bunker/bd92b8a4-6a99-4199-aa9d-08f0c084f1e2"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Purchase status: (don't know, not running in Windows 8)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Cannons will be ready in the next round!"
